page.title: 05CHURCH FARM, EASTON GREY
page.content: 400 acre Church Farm, divided between corn and 135 Friesian cows & followers.Rotation consists of rape,oats, wheat & barley.Yields of over 3 tons per acre of wheat are obtainable{without excessive use of {chemicals. 13 years ago Dutch Elm disease left the sad skeletons of trees all over the farm.To compensate they used the Countryside commission grant for replanting and set out to maximise the opportunities for{wildlife on the farm by careful management of woods, hedges, ponds and awkward corners on steep or damp land . Given the{Country Life Farming and {Wildlife Award in 1980. }Since then numerous parties have been round the farm. (Bill Wilder, the farmer, is at present Chairman of the Farming and Wild Life Advisory Group in the UK.)
